Mobile Phones

This list contains 17422 Mobile Phones in India. This price list was last updated on Jul 30, 2024.

Top 3 Mobile Phones are as follows:
  1. Vivo V40 Pro: 144 Hz Display with Punch Hole, Dual Sim, 50 MP + 50 MP + 50 MP Triple Rear & 50 MP Front Camera, 3G, Wi-Fi
  2. Realme 13 Pro Plus 5G: Snapdragon 7s Gen2, Android v14, 1080 x 2412 px, 4G, 2.4 GHz Processor
  3. OPPO K12x: Wi-Fi, 2.4 GHz Processor, 720 x 1604 px, 120 Hz Display with Punch Hole, 5G
